SELECT DISTINCT OD.order_code, OD.statement_number, OD.order_faulty_divide, st.statement_name as divideName, sh.shop_name, OD.order_amount, OD.order_price, OD.receipt_category_code, cate.category_small as cateReceipt, OD.order_category_code, categ.category_small as cateOrder, OD.order_request, OD.order_approval, OD.order_release, OD.head_employee_code, OD.order_faulty_able, OD.local_category_code, OD.shop_code, head.head_employee_name as headName, it.item_name as itemName
FROM `order` as OD INNER JOIN category as cate ON OD.receipt_category_code = cate.category_code LEFT JOIN category as categ ON OD.order_category_code = categ.category_code LEFT JOIN shop as sh ON OD.local_category_code = sh.local_category_code AND OD.shop_code = sh.shop_code LEFT JOIN statement as st ON st.statement_code = OD.order_faulty_divide LEFT JOIN head_employee as head ON OD.head_employee_code = head.head_employee_code LEFT JOIN item as it ON OD.item_code = it.item_code
WHERE OD.local_category_code = #{localCategoryCode} AND OD.shop_code = #{shopCode} AND (OD.order_faulty_divide = 'C' OR OD.order_faulty_divide = 'D' OR OD.order_faulty_divide = 'E')
GROUP BY OD.statement_number

Select od.order_code, od.statement_number, od.order_faulty_divide, st.statement_name as divideName, od.local_category_code, od.shop_code, od.item_code, it.item_name as itemName, od.order_amount, od.order_price, od.receipt_category_code, catereceipt.category_small as cateReceipt, od.order_category_code, cateorder.category_small as cateOrder, od.order_request, od.order_approval, od.order_release, od.head_employee_code, he.head_employee_name as headName, od.order_faulty_able
FROM `order` as od INNER JOIN statement as st ON od.order_faulty_divide = st.statement_code LEFT JOIN item as it ON od.item_code = it.item_code LEFT JOIN category as catereceipt ON od.receipt_category_code = catereceipt.category_code LEFT JOIN category as cateorder ON od.order_category_code = cateorder.category_code LEFT JOIN head_employee as he ON od.head_employee_code = he.head_employee_code WHERE od.statement_number = #{statementNumber}
